item.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wEkgs95COKg&feature=relmfu

Saturday May 5th 2012 ~ 1pm to 2:30pm
Free Six Count Lindy ( East Coast Swing )
No Cost or Obligation ~ Open To All Levels
Will Feature New Moves With Smooth Styling
Get Wicked Smooth!

Saturday May 5th 2012 - 2:30pm to 4:30 pm
Partner Charleston and Lindy Hop $15.
Open to all Levels

From 495 N or S, Take Exit 29B to Route 2 West and follow directions below.

From Route 2, either West or East, take Exit 31A. That will put you on North Main
Street which is Route 12 going South. Come to the first set of lights. Take a Left onto
Hamilton St. for about a half mile. Global Fitness Center will be on your Left up on a
hill. Watch for their sign.

From Worcester: Take I-190 North and merge onto Route 2 West. Follow directions
above.
More Information: Website: http://www.dance2swing.com
item.name: Free Group East Coast Swing Dance Lesson
